blogPost.title: Desmond Tutu’s legacy, many said, was one of unity and service, built on a life of campaigning for dignity for people everywhere and helping bridge divides. https://t.co/DnpUTEbxQB
blogPost.author: The New York Times

previous.title: Desmond Tutu, the Nobel Peace Prize-winning archbishop and chairman of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission who helped bring down apartheid in South Africa, has died at 90. https://t.co/G06dBduqyG

localize.full_text: ノーベル平和賞を受賞した大主教で、南アフリカのアパルトヘイト撤廃に貢献した「真実と調停のための委員会」委員長のデズモンド・ツツ氏が90歳で死去した。https://t.co/G06dBduqyG。
诺贝尔和平奖得主、曾帮助推翻南非种族隔离制度的真相与和解委员会主席德斯蒙德-图图去世，享年90岁。https://t.co/G06dBduqyG。
諾貝爾和平獎得主、曾幫助推翻南非種族隔離制度的真相與和解委員會主席德斯蒙德-圖圖去世，享年90歲。https://t.co/G06dBduqyG。

next.title: Elijah Wood kept a pair of hairy hobbit feet in the same box they were given to him in for over 20 years, reminding him of his time in "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy. As he reflects on his career, he knows that to some fans, he will always be Frodo. https://t.co/FpKx688sI4
